resources.string: When \'Torch Quick\' is enabled, turn on/off Torch just by holding Volume Buttons together
Turn on torch just by holding volume buttons together with Torch. Download Torch now!

Make your life easier with Torch! 

Enable 'Torch functionality' to turn on/off torch just by holding volume buttons together!

Tweak more in Torch Settings!
Enable \'Torch Quick\' from Accessibility Services to experience Torch.

Usage of Accessibility Service \nTorch requires a service to run in background to intercept PHYSICAL VOLUME BUTTON KEY presses. Since a normal \'Service\' cannot intercept Physical Hardware Key presses, an \'Accessibility Service\' is used for this purpose. It does not do anything apart from intercepting Volume Key presses! I promise!

About the PERMISSION - "...observe text that you type & observe your actions..."
Alas! It's threatening! Android throws a 'Key Event' only when a HARDWARE KEY is pressed. It is by this way, Torch captures Volume Key presses. But It is Android's flaw, showing the same WARNING even for NON-HARDWARE KEYBOARD ENABLED PHONES (except very old Android devices and Blackberry Priv which had/have hardware keyboard for typing). It is impossible to design Torch Functionality without this permission 
Also, Torch DOES NOT HAVE INTERNET PERMISSION, so it is impossible to send anything to anyone

Torch CANNOT COLLECT anything from anyone. Feel free to enable Torch functionality! Learn more

Torch is made by two brothers
Merbin J Anselm and Rebin J Anselm
anselmbros@gmail.com

Many thanks to following great hearts, who helped to translate Torch
We\'ve spent lot\'s of hours making Torch, that you may not lose a second turning on torch!\nSupport the work of Torch by donating us
Your care motivates us!\n\nShare a word about Torch with your family and friends!
Oops! Error while sharing love with us!
Will not work in Screen off!
Move phone away from proximity sensor and try again
